authors: Sophie Goulopoulos For Daily Mail Australia
description: She's a red carpet regular as host of Extra.
title: Extra's Renée Bargh dons chandelier earrings at Golden Globes 2016
title_page: Extra's Renée Bargh dons chandelier earrings at Golden Globes 2016 | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's a red carpet regular as host of Extra.
And even though she may interview A-list celebrities regularly, Australian star Renée Bargh certainly gives them a run for their money with her fashion.
The 29-year-old turned heads as she appeared at the 2016 Golden Globe Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday, flaunting her toned legs in a white Rachel Gilbert gown.
Scroll down for video
A vision in white! Australian presenter Renée Bargh turned heads as she appeared at the 2016 Golden Globe Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday, in a white Rachel Gilbert gown
The strapless frock featured an over-sized bow over the bust and a daring thigh-high split.
The blonde completed her look with nude pointed heels, a white manicure, a soft golden tan, and accessorised with Neil Lane gold chandelier earrings.
Keeping her make-up simple, the Queensland native wore a dusting of bronze eye shadow and a slick of nude lipstick.
Her hair was parted in the middle and straightened and brushed behind her ears and shoulders.
See full coverage on the Golden Globes winners and red carpet fashion
Statement piece: The blonde accessorised with over-sized Neil Lane gold chandelier earrings. She kept her make-up simple and used neutral tones for eye shadow and lipstick
Flawless: The strapless frock featured an over-sized bow and a thigh-high split
Renée shared various shots of herself to Instagram from the big day - one of the biggest on the Hollywood calendar - including a shot standing on the red carpet.
She captioned it stating it 'takes a village' to get ready for the glamorous event.
The beauty also shared a black and white shot of herself sitting in a hair and make-up chair before hand, wearing a singlet, jeans, runners and a fur coat.
She also shared a snap of herself standing with TV personality and actress Rocsi Diaz, holding a bottle of Moet and saying they were 'covering' the after parties together.
Days prior to the event, she posed for a happy snap in front of the Beverly Hilton where the red carpet was being laid out.
Documenting the experience: Renée shared various shots of herself to Instagram from the big day including a shot standing on the red carpet
Preparations: The beauty also shared a black and white shot of herself sitting in a hair and make-up chair before hand, wearing a singlet, jeans, runners and a fur coat
'T [time] minus 2 days!' Renee posed outside the Beverly Hilton where the awards are held
Renee was rugged up from the cold in a large camel coat with a navy and white polka-dot blouse underneath and thigh-high black suede boots.
In the caption she wrote: 'Preparations are under way! T [time] minus 2 days.'
Earlier this week, she attended the People's Choice Awards in LA, and stunned once again in a teal lace dress with a navy crop top and skirt underneath.
